user_instruction: 'Send an email to Emily (emily@icepmail.com) updating her on what'"'"'s new with me. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi there,

Could you please look through my Gmail and Notion workspaces and pull together the key personal and professional updates I’ve shared there over the last few weeks? I’d like to use that information to draft an email to my pen pal, Emily (emily@icepmail.com), letting her know what’s new with me.

Thanks a lot for your help!

Best,
Jane

final_output:
Hi there,

Could you please look through my Gmail and Notion workspaces and pull together the key personal and professional updates I’ve shared there over the last few weeks? I’d like to use that information to draft an email to my pen pal, Emily (emily@icepmail.com), letting her know what’s new with me.

Thanks a lot for your help!

Best,
Jane
